metaDescription: Find top-rated financial advisors in Hagerstown. Expert guidance for retirement planning, wealth management, and investment strategies.

advisors.name: Edward Jones - Financial Advisor: Lisa M Taylor, ChFC®|CRPC™
Edward Jones - Financial Advisor: Katie Schwartz, CFP®|ChFC®|AAMS®

heroDescription: Hagerstown, Maryland, is a growing city with a rich history and vibrant community.
landscapeDescription: Hagerstown's economy is diverse, with strengths in manufacturing, healthcare, and retail. The city serves as a regional hub for commerce and logistics.
uniqueNeeds: Hagerstown requires focused investment in infrastructure and workforce development to support its growing economy.
citySpecificRiskAdvice: Hagerstown's manufacturing sector faces risks from economic downturns; real estate prices may rise due to demand. Flooding risks exist; diversify investments to mitigate impacts.

sections.title: Economic Growth
sections.description: According to BEA (2023), Hagerstown's economy has seen a 3% growth rate, driven by local manufacturing and healthcare expansion.

sections.title: Wealth Demographics
sections.description: According to Census (2023), the median household income in Hagerstown is $55,000, reflecting a stable economic environment.

sections.title: Advisor Specializations
sections.description: Based on BLS (2023), financial advisors in Hagerstown are increasingly specializing in retirement planning and small business consulting.

sections.title: Cost of Living
sections.description: According to BLS (2024), Hagerstown's cost of living is 10% lower than the national average, making it an attractive place to live.

sections.title: Real Estate Market
sections.description: According to Zillow (2024), Hagerstown's real estate market has seen a 5% increase in home values over the past year, indicating strong demand.

sections.title: Business Environment
sections.description: According to Fortune (2024), Hagerstown's business climate is favorable, with incentives for small businesses and a supportive local government.
